function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Intense threat and surprise during defensive phase","Impact":"Increased pressure and uncertainty, limited availability of information","Mitigation":"Implement contingency planning, communications, and systems' complexity management","Technologies":"Crisis management software, communication platforms","People":"Organizational leaders, crisis management teams","Owner":"Organizational leaders, crisis management teams"},{"Description":"Constraints in communication during crisis","Impact":"Generation of disinformation and fake news, hampering response actions","Mitigation":"Establish effective communication channels, control speculation through information and image management","Technologies":"Communication tools, media monitoring software","People":"Public, media, stakeholders","Owner":"Communication and crisis management teams"},{"Description":"Need to restore confidence among stakeholders in consolidation phase","Impact":"Loss of trust and confidence, hindered long-term strategies","Mitigation":"Implement long-term recovery strategies, focus on restoring confidence among stakeholders","Technologies":"Stakeholder management software, communication platforms","People":"Organizational leaders, stakeholder management teams","Owner":"Organizational leaders, stakeholder management teams"}]}
